title: Rvce cs + specialisation vs pes cs rr
content: Which one should I go for? Is pes cs rr better than rvce specialisation like aiml cybersecurity etc

comments.body: RV specialisation without any doubt.  But I would rather say the opposite if you compare RV AIML and PES RR CSE. Only go for AIML if you're REALLY interested and ready to do masters and stuffs.
